resources.string: I have clearly understood the software permission statement
I have clearly understood all privacy policies of this software
Grant permission by tapping \"Yes\" on the Wi-Fi notification
Unable to connect to Wi-Fi using the QR code provided. Please connect via Network settings.
"Here's the best shot you captured of this moment"
Cinemagraph is unavailable when battery saver mode is on
"Your recording won't be saved. Are you sure you want to go back?"
Hold the camera still for the best results
Camera needs permission to access some things on your device. Open Camera on the internal display to grant permissions.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Unable to capture group selfie. Try again.
Unable to capture group selfie. Try rotating the device slower.
Camera is performing image processing service
Unable to capture media. Could not access SD card.
The same motion works on the front camera too
Burst shot is unavailable in this mode
Burst shots can only be taken in .jpg format
Burst shot is unavailable when filters are used
Burst shot is unavailable when the exposure time is adjusted
Camera has been disabled by your administrator
"Can't use camera. Make sure that %1$s is off and close any apps that may be using the camera. If the problem continues, please restart your phone."
Camera unable to start. If this happens again, please power off your phone and restart.
"Camera can't be used because another app is using it."
"Your camera hardware isn't working right now. Tap GET HELP for further assistance. Error code: %1$08X"
"Your camera hardware isn't working right now. Please contact customer support. Error code: %1$08X"
"Connected camera isn't supported. Disconnect to open the Camera app."
"SD card isn't writable. Switching to internal storage."

"This unprocessed file type is used to professionally edit photos.
Note: the file size will be 4-5 times larger than the standard JPG format."
"Selfie camera hardware isn't working. Switching to rear camera. Tap GET HELP for further assistance. Error code: %1$08X"
"Selfie camera hardware isn't working. Switching to rear camera. Please contact customer support. Error code: %1$08X"
To see where your photos and videos were taken, turn on location consent in Settings
To add location information to your photos and videos, turn on location consent in Settings
Start capturing, then rotate left and right
Please update Files by Google to avoid image processing issues
Please update Moto Camera Content to use Doc Scan mode
Please update Moto Camera Content to use Slide Scan mode
Please update Moto Camera Content to use Portrait mode
Please update Moto Camera Content to use Gesture Selfie
Please update Moto Camera Content to use Image Stabilisation
Please update Moto Camera Content to use Shot Optimisation
Please update Google Photos to use Live Filter mode
The camera can only run under a full screen
"Some modes aren't available. Tap GET HELP for further assistance. Error code: %1$08X"
"Some modes aren't available. Please contact customer support. Error code: %1$08X"
Size limit reached. New video started.
You need to free up some space on your %1$s. Tap CONTINUE to choose files to delete.
For a better Low Light AI experience, please update Moto Camera Content
For a better under-display camera experience, please update Moto Camera Content
Please update Moto Camera Content to access advanced Portrait features
For a better Image Stabilisation experience, please update Moto Camera Content
For a better Auto Smile Capture experience, please update Moto Camera Content
Press the capture button and move the phone in one direction
Start moving the phone and align the circles
Keep moving the phone to align the circles or tap the shutter to stop capturing.
Keep moving in the same direction
"Some modes aren't available. Tap GET HELP for further assistance. Error code: %1$08X"
"Some modes aren't available. Please contact customer support. Error code: %1$08X"
"The rear camera hardware isn't working. Switching to selfie camera. Tap GET HELP for further assistance. Error code: %1$08X"
"The rear camera hardware isn't working. Switching to selfie camera. Please contact customer support. Error code: %1$08X"
To mute your phone while recording a video, Camera needs permission to access Do Not Disturb. Tap CONTINUE to grant permission.
Do you want to store photos and videos on your SD card?
"Camera couldn't capture media because the SD card is unavailable."
This feature is only available for JPG output
Unlock your device to change storage
Camera couldn’t update. Try again in the Google Play Store.
"Camera can't capture video because the recorder is busy. To record a video, stop the current recording or restart."
Video size limit reached. Stopping capture.
Video size limit almost reached. Capture will stop soon.
Cannot start video capture. Another app may be using the mic.
"Unable to edit a doc that's been restored from Google Photos"
Try in better lighting or on a darker surface
Flash will be turned off when you turn on Active Photos
"Google Lens isn't working right now. Please relaunch the camera and try again."
When you turn on %1$s, resolution will switch to 4K at 30FPS
When you turn on %1$s, the main lens will be used
%1$s doesn’t work with this frame rate
HDR and flash will be turned off when you turn on Active Photos
HDR will be turned off when you turn on Active Photos
Macro mode helps you take detailed photos of subjects as close as 2.5 cm away from the lens
Macro mode helps you take detailed photos of subjects as close as 2.5 cm away from the lens
Create a GIF or MP4 video with a splash of motion on a frozen image
Do you want to continue the Camera tour?
Capture richer, more professional-looking images with a camera built specifically for black and white
"Cutout lets you change the background after you've taken a photo. To use Cutout, go to the gallery and choose a photo, tap \"Edit\", then choose \"Add background\" to modify the photo."
You have a smart, powerful camera in the palm of your hand. Learn how to use it to take great photos and videos.
Macro mode helps you take detailed photos of subjects as close as 4 cm away from the lens
Macro mode helps you take detailed photos of subjects as close as 4 cm away from the lens
Use Portrait mode to blur the background for a bokeh effect
Using slow motion at 120 or 240fps lets you focus on people and objects moving quickly, such as athletes in play, a running dog or moving water.
LED light may flicker in slow motion videos. For the best results, shoot in natural light.
Pick a colour to highlight in your photo and turn everything else black and white
"Pick a colour to highlight in your video and turn everything else black and white. You can also switch colours while you're recording."
At 960fps, super slow motion lets you capture the details of explosive moments, such as balloons popping, objects breaking or water splashing.
"Welcome! Don't forget, you can also open the camera by twisting your wrist twice."
Keep the screen at a fixed orientation while recording
Change horizon to portrait or landscape
Shoot in B&W like a pro
"Show an animation on the Quick View display to get your subject's attention"
Amplify audio in the zoomed area of the viewfinder
Show your palm to take a selfie
Capture automatically when everyone in the frame is smiling
Tap the subject to track it automatically. Supports 30fps video.
Automatically switch to macro camera when shooting macro objects
You can take higher-quality selfies with the flip closed
"Show an animation on the Quick View display to get your subject's attention"
Show a preview on the Quick View display after capturing with the flip open
Reduce file size by saving as H.265/HEVC instead of H.264/AVC. Some platforms may not support the HEVC format.
Reduce file size for UHD videos by saving as H.265/HEVC instead of H.264/AVC. Some platforms may not support the HEVC format.
Right after you take a photo, you can show a preview on the Quick View display
Open the camera with the last used mode active
Twist your wrist twice quickly to open the selfie camera
Twist your wrist twice quickly to open the rear camera
Double tap the power button to open the camera
Twist your wrist twice quickly to open the camera at any time
Twist twice to open or switch between selfie and rear cameras
Enhance photos with automatic tuning and AI scene detection
See suggestions for enhancing your photos.
Automatically level and implement the rule of thirds
Reduce wind noise and ambient noise in video recording.
Capture by tapping anywhere on the screen.
Capture by tapping anywhere on the internal display
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
Use Ultra-Res to capture photos with the highest resolution. This mode works best in outdoor lighting.
Capture all the details with crisp close-up photos and videos
The Action Cam lets you take wide angle videos with one hand
Switch between the wide-angle and standard lens by tapping the Action Cam icon
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
Switch to full screen to continue editing
To capture a photo or video, tap anywhere on the screen
You can also capture by tapping on a volume key
Network unavailable. Please check your data connection.
Allow this app to control Motorola camera
Camera needs permission to access some things on your device. To grant permissions, tap on \"Permissions\" in App info.
According to different services or scenarios during your using our application, you may need to enable relevant permissions:
When you start using a function requiring the above permissions, you will be present with a permission request. You can choose to grant or reject. Once rejected, the function might not work properly.
The ratio cannot be changed in certain modes.
"The ratio can't be changed in some modes or when the pro photo format is RAW."
"Pro mode photos are optimised for the best resolution. The ratio can't be changed in some modes or when the Pro mode photo format is RAW."
"Here's your photo enhanced for low light"
"Here's your photo enhanced with smart composition"
Use the depth editor to select focus, replace the background or select an area to change to black and white
Use the editor to adjust the crop and scanning style
"Use the editor to replace a photo's background with colours, preloaded images or other photos from your library"
Use the editor to select focus or change an area to black and white
Stabilisation was interrupted. Go to Google Photos to try again.

"Thank your for using%s！ We are very aware that you attach great importance to personal information and privacy protection. You can learn more about relevant information by reading%s. We will wholeheartedly protect your personal information security and provide you with better services in accordance with laws!"
"Exposure compensation can't be adjusted when shutter speed and ISO are fixed."
This will return your modes carousel to the default settings
"Resolution values are based on the aspect ratio you've chosen"
This will reset all Camera settings
No faces detected. Taking normal photo.
"Video stabilisation can't be used when Face Beauty is on"
Video stabilisation is turned off because your device is too warm
When processing is stopped, a normal slow motion video will be saved
For the best results, shoot in a well-lit environment and hold the device steady
A regular Slow motion video was saved
A normal slow motion video will be saved at %1$dfps
Audio lens switch PIP window disabled
Audio lens switch PIP window enabled
Tap to switch from %1$s to %2$s lens
The video duration is too short
Auto Smile Capture is on. You can turn it off in settings.
Auto Smile Capture and Gesture Selfie are on. You can turn them off in settings.
Your battery is running low. Some features may be limited.
"You're in battery saver mode. Some features may be limited."
"Face beauty can't be used when stabilisation is on"
Say something to wake the front camera up
Photo and video locations will be saved
Photo and video locations appear after you turn on \"Save location\"
Gesture Selfie is on. You can turn it off in settings.
Use Ultra-Res mode for higher resolution
Headsets are not available in Vlog mode
"This lens isn't available in high resolution"
Keep the distance within 2–10 cm for a better result
The best focal distance is 4 cm or about the width of 2 fingers.
Move farther away for better focus
Please unfold your phone to start using Panorama
Photo size changed to 4:3 for best resolution
"Resolution can't be changed when Pro mode photo format is RAW"
"Resolution can't be changed in this mode"
"Selfie photo mirror can't be changed in this mode"
Rotate your phone to landscape orientation for the best experience
For the best quality in the current lighting conditions: we recommend switching to normal photo mode.
"This mode can't be used on a connected display"
Hold in portrait for a wide-angle video
This lens is only available in FHD at 30FPS
Settings have been configured for night vision
Settings have been configured for portrait video
Video size cannot be changed in this mode
Video size is limited due to device temperature
Recording stopped due to device temperature
Settings have been configured for Horizon lock
"Manual zoom isn't available in Cutout mode"
"Manual zoom isn't available in Portrait mode"
"Manual zoom isn't available for the RAW format"
Zoom range is limited for this resolution
Tap to clear the brushed area
Draw with the brush where you want to see motion. Use the eraser on areas you want to freeze.
Adjust the duration or how the clip loops
Slide to adjust the colour intensity
Tap to control the flash and timer
Swipe down for more detailed capture options.
Vlog mode. A new way to record a Dual capture video! The front camera will work while you are speaking
Tap to change the viewfinder layout
Tap to switch from rear to selfie lens
Tap to switch from selfie to rear lens
Tap to swap views or drag to move the window
Swipe to switch modes. Swipe all the way towards the right for more modes.
Learn about the mode and how to use it
Tap Settings for more features or to replay this tutorial.
Use auto-zoom and auto-capture to scan slides quickly
Turn on super slow motion to capture video in 960fps. Audio is turned off in super slow motion.
Drag the handles where you want to slow down the video.
to switch from photo to video mode, or switch from any other mode to photo mode.
to take photos or start/stop video recording.
Tap to switch lenses, or hold and drag to fine-tune zoom.
To take straighter shots, turn on the leveller in settings
Your mode stays here until you choose a new one
Find more tips and features in Settings
Update to the latest version for new features and bug fixes
The objects are too close to the background to capture a portrait photo. Normal photo will be captured.
The subject is too close to the background
A face must be in the frame
Portrait and Cutout photos cannot be captured when a lens is covered
"Portrait photos can't be captured when a lens is covered"
No face detected. Taking a normal photo.
The objects are too close to capture a portrait photo. Normal photo will be captured.
The objects are too far away to capture a portrait photo. Taking a normal photo.
It is too dark to capture a Portrait photo. Taking normal photo.
For best results, shoot in a well-lit environment.
"It's too dark to capture a portrait video. Taking normal video."
Show date and time on photos
Re-enabling the lens will switch to FHD @ 30FPS
Re-enabling the lens will revert to the recommended resolution
Telephoto does not support the current resolution.
Ultra-wide does not support the current resolution.
